official-title.#text:
Calling for the immediate and unconditional release of the three kidnapped teenagers held captive
			 in the West Bank, and for other purposes.

cosponsor.#tail: ) submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the

text.#text:
demands the immediate and unconditional release of the three captives, Eyal Yifrach, Gil-ad Sha'er
			 and Naftali Frankel;

unshakeable support for the State of Israel as a Jewish and democratic state, with secure borders,
			 living in peace and security alongside an independent Palestinian state;

ongoing concern and sympathy for the families of Eyal Yifrach, Gil-ad Sha'er, and Naftali Frankel;
			 and
full commitment to seek the immediate and unconditional release of the captives; and

reiterates its commitment to upholding the conditions in United States law in regards to United
			 States assistance to the Palestinian Authority.

Whereas on June 12, 2014, three Israeli teenagers, Eyal Yifrach, Gil-ad Sha'er, and Naftali
			 Frankel, disappeared returning home from school in Gush Etzion;
Whereas Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said that the teenagers were
Whereas Naftali Frankel holds United States citizenship;

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
immediately condemned the kidnapping of the three
			 teenagers, urged cooperation between the Israeli and Palestinian security
			 services, acknowledged that

quote.#text: many indications point to Hamas’ involvement

Hamas is a terrorist organization known for its attacks on innocent civilians and which has used
			 kidnapping in the past.

are human beings and we are looking for them and we will hold their kidnappers accountable whoever
			 they are

text.#text: Whereas Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas said that the kidnapped boys

quote.#text: blesses the hands of those who kidnapped

if there is a confirmation that a Palestinian group is behind the kidnapping, we should applaud and
			 take off our hats to them

text.#text: Whereas Khalid Meshaal, head of Hamas, was quoted as saying that he

Whereas the International Committee of the Red Cross has called for the immediate and unconditional
			 release of the three teenagers;

Whereas continual security cooperation between the Palestinian Authority security forces and Israel
			 is essential to preventing future violence and incidents of kidnapping;

Whereas the Palestinian Authority recently announced a reconciliation agreement between Hamas and
			 Fatah, paving the way for a unity government supported by Hamas; and

quote.#tail: , or that results from an agreement with Hamas and over which Hamas exercises
quote.#text: power-sharing PA government that includes Hamas as a member

states that no
			 United States assistance is permitted for a
